item.title: MonArch
item.description: Problem description and vision of MonArch I’ve long searched for a tool to visualize architecture, service-topology and monitoring in an intuitive way. An intuitive way in this case means from my point of view, visualizing the picture I have in my mind regarding service communication and data-flow. Architecture and or service-topology refers to what I would call “domain/business logic architecture” in microservices. Microservices inherently have a lot of data flowing between them as they are all working together to solve a larger business related problem.
